title: Workaround for Saving Photos to Device from the Cloud? Android 11 Bug
content:
Since updating to Android 11, I can no longer save/edit/share photos from Google Photos Cloud back to my device. When I scroll to old photos in Google Photos and select "download to Device" it only saves a dark grey/black box at the top of my Google Photos. And I'm unable to then share or edit those photos.

I've tried uninstalling/reinstalling/updating Photos from the Play Store, but same bug remains. I've also tried searching for a ".nomedia" folder on my phone that was mentioned in another thread but have no idea where people are finding this photo. I don't appear to have it.
